评论详情: I ordered size 8 two times in 2 years. Both the times size 6 is sent to me. Not sure if it was an honest mistake or incorrect size sent intentionally. I love this dress and the material, but I am disappointed every time I order it
Great for winter but I recommend sizing 1-2 up than normal
Beautiful, great quality, no damage, and discounted?? I'll be getting much more pre-loved Rent the Runway pieces for my professional wardrobe.

This is a very well made tweed dress. The only issue I had is with my DD chest, you could see my bra on the side’s underneath where my armpit was so had to wear a jacket over. I think this would fit great on someone with a smaller chest and have no issues. This dress would be very versatile for work.
